scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=local concurrently "yarn dev:backend" "yarn dev:frontend" "yarn dev:ai"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=local yarn start:dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=local yarn dev
scripts.dev:ai: cd ai-services/orchestrator-svc && cross-env NODE_ENV=local uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.smoke:artillery: bash -lc 'if command -v artillery >/dev/null; then artillery run tools/artillery.smoke.yml; else echo "artillery is not installed. Install it with \"npm i -g artillery\" to run this check." >&2; exit 1; fi'
